title: bhavamulOna
sahitya:
bhAvamulOna bAhayamulandunu gOvindA gOvindA ani koluvavO

manasA 

(bhAvamu)



caraNam 1



hari avatAramulE akhila dEvatalu hari lOni vE brahmANDambulu

hari nAmamulE anni mantramulu hari hari hari hari anavO manasA

(bhAvamu)



caraNam 2



viSNuni mahimalE vihita karmamulu viSNuni pogaDeDi

vEdambulu

viSNudokkadE vishvAntarAdamuDu viSNuvu viSNuvani vedakavO manasA

(bhAvamu)



caraNam 3



acyutuDitadE Adiyu antyamu acyutudE asurAntakuDu

acyutuDu shrI venkatAdri mIdanitE acyutA acyutA sharaNavO manasA

(bhAvamu)
